opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 20th day of August, 2015, the Application to Intervene to Enforce the Judgment of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania is DENIED.
Justice STEVENS did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
